sourcesContent: import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Tag } from '../shared/models/Tag'; @Component({ selector: 'app-tags', templateUrl: './tags.component.html', styleUrls: ['./tags.component.css'] }) export class TagsComponent implements OnInit { status : boolean; tags: Tag[] = []; constructor() { this.status = false; } ngOnInit(): void { } }
